title: rpcdaemon crash when query on certain transaction
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2021.07.5-alpha


OS & Version: Debian 10 

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
rpcdaemon crash when POST query on certain transactions

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Do a POST curl like :  
````
curl --location --request POST 'http://127.0.0.1:8545' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '[{
            "method": "debug_traceTransaction",
            "params": ["0x0c10fafe0cdbfff32abfe53d57ec861d09986cc1050c850481f79b1a862bb10a", { "tracer": "callTracer"}],
            "jsonrpc": "2.0",
            "id": "0x0c10fafe0cdbfff32abfe53d57ec861d09986cc1050c850481f79b1a862bb10a"
        }]'
````
